answers.answer: I am. I wanted a vbac but i live in Florida and i have United healthcare. The worst insurance. All the doctors covered under my insurance will not do it because of liability reasons. I had a c section with my first baby, so Florida makes you automatically have another c section. But i have a condition that will be affected if i try a vbac. So im happy with the c section. May 22nd can not come fast enough

The only way they will give you a c section unless something is wrong woth you or you baby that puts you guys at risk. And you don't even talk about setting a dat for scheduled c sections till about a month to your due date. With a schedule c section they take them a week early if that.
Thanks that helps!! Good luck to u jlcavender!

I had a scheduled c-section with my first baby because of a 20 cm cyst on my right ovary. They usually wait until 39 weeks to do a scheduled c-section. I'm having another one in March between 37 and 39 weeks depends on what my doctor wants to do since I have gestational diabetes this pregnancy.

question: Just wondering who here is having a scheduled c section and how they came upon that?I am trying to convince my Dr that I want a scheduled c section Cuz of my Back pain I was in a serious car accident almost 3 yrs ago and still haven't recovered from it.  I am 15 weeks and my back is in extreme pain to the point I can't even sleep at night and my Dr just say well see when u get closer to delivery how close do I need to be and what do you think my chances are
title: How many have a scheduled c section?
